text: Brownlow William Knox (1806 – 14 March 1873) was a British Conservative Party politician. He was elected MP for Great Marlow in 1847 and held the seat until 1868. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs for English constituencies Category:UK MPs 1847–1852 Category:UK MPs 1852–1857 Category:UK MPs 1857–1859 Category:UK MPs 1859–1865 Category:UK MPs 1865–1868 Category:1806 births Category:1873 deaths
title: Brownlow Knox
